summary: This is an email correspondence regarding protective orders in the cases of Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell. It includes attachments of court orders and a government motion related to discovery and protective measures.

events.title: Court grants government motion for protective order in Maxwell case
events.description: A memorandum and order was issued granting the government's motion for a protective order in the Ghislaine Maxwell case.

events.title: Signed protective order docketed in Maxwell case
events.description: A signed protective order was docketed in the Ghislaine Maxwell case.

events.title: Protective order for discovery signed in Epstein case
events.description: A protective order for discovery was signed in the Jeffrey Epstein case.

events.title: Government letter regarding protective order in Maxwell case
events.description: A letter from the government regarding a protective order in the Ghislaine Maxwell case was finalized.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated January 28, 2021, concerning protective orders for Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.
It references multiple legal documents from 2019 and 2020, including court orders and government motions.
The correspondence involves an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York.
The attachments indicate ongoing legal proceedings and protective measures in both the Epstein and Maxwell cases.
